rules.natural: If an artwork is included in the exhibition, then it meets the standards or does not violate the guidelines.
Provided that the catalog features the artwork, the artwork is included in the exhibition.
Whenever a visitor purchases the catalog, they attend the exhibition.
If the critic reviews the exhibition, then the visitor purchases the catalog.
In the event that the exhibition opens on the date, the artist does not withdraw from the exhibition.
The exhibition runs for the period only if it opens on the date.
Whenever the exhibition closes on the date, it is extended for the period.
Provided that the exhibition is extended for the period, it runs for the period.
If the museum organizes the exhibition, then when the committee approves the artwork, displaying the artwork in the exhibition leads to the exhibition being successful.
Provided that the artist participates in the exhibition, the critic reviews the exhibition.
Whenever the artist participates in the exhibition, they withdraw from the exhibition.
If the artist participates in the exhibition, then it is not the case that the visitor attends the exhibition.
Either the artist participates in the exhibition or, if the exhibition is not successful, the gallery receives funding from the sponsor.
In the event that the corporation sponsors the exhibition, then when the committee approves the artwork, displaying the artwork in the exhibition results in the exhibition being successful.
If the media promotes the exhibition, then either the museum organizes the exhibition or the corporation sponsors the exhibition.
Either the group protests the exhibition or the media promotes the exhibition.
Provided that the authority censors the artwork, the artwork does not violate the guidelines.
If the curator removes the artwork, then the artwork does not violate the guidelines.
The artwork creates a scandal only if it generates publicity.
Whenever the artwork wins an award, it meets the standards.
Provided that the artwork is rejected, it does not violate the guidelines.
If the jury selects the artwork, then either the artwork wins an award or it is rejected.
Either the jury selects the artwork or the panel nominates the artwork.
If the panel nominates the artwork, then the artwork is shortlisted.
Provided that the artwork is shortlisted, then either it wins an award or it is rejected.
Either the artwork is featured in the exhibition or it is not excluded from the exhibition.
If the artist accepts the invitation to the exhibition, then they do not withdraw from the exhibition.
Either the artist accepts the invitation to the exhibition or they decline the invitation to the exhibition.
Whenever the artist declines the invitation to the exhibition, they do not withdraw from the exhibition.
If it is not the case that either the authority censors the artwork or the curator removes the artwork, then the artwork creates a scandal.

If it is not the case that the committee approving the artwork implies that displaying the artwork in the exhibition leads to the exhibition being successful, then the artwork violates the guidelines.
In the event that the artwork is not included in the exhibition, then it is excluded from the exhibition.
